statements: SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic, activity_count FROM trending_topics WHERE activity_count > 100;
SELECT id, topic, activity_count FROM trending_topics ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE hashtag LIKE '%#tech%';
SELECT id, topic FROM trending_topics WHERE activity_count < 50 ORDER BY activity_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE activity_count > 100 ORDER BY topic ASC, id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT topic, hashtag, activity_count FROM trending_topics WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY activity_count DESC
SELECT id, topic FROM trending_topics WHERE hashtag LIKE 'data%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT topic, activity_count FROM trending_topics WHERE activity_count < 50 ORDER BY topic DESC
SELECT id, topic, hashtag FROM trending_topics WHERE topic = 'technology' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic, popularity FROM trending_topics WHERE popularity > 100 ORDER BY popularity DESC;
SELECT id, topic FROM trending_topics WHERE topic LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY topic ASC;
SELECT SUM(popularity) AS total_popularity FROM trending_topics;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE popularity > 100 ORDER BY popularity DESC;
SELECT topic, popularity FROM trending_topics WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT topic, popularity FROM trending_topics WHERE popularity > 50 AND topic LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(hashtag) AS hashtag_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(hashtag) > 5 ORDER BY hashtag_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, activity_details FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TrendingTopics WHERE total_mentions > 100 ORDER BY topic_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_hashtags FROM UserHashtag GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT topic_name, total_mentions FROM TrendingTopics WHERE topic_name LIKE 'SQL%' OR topic_name LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY total_mentions DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_details FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT topic_name, total_mentions FROM TrendingTopics WHERE total_mentions > 100 ORDER BY total_mentions DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(hashtag) AS hashtag_count FROM UserHashtag GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(hashtag) > 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type LIKE '%view%' AND activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_title, topic_description FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;

SELECT topic_title, hashtag_text FROM trending_topics JOIN topic_hashtags ON trending_topics.topic_id = topic_hashtags.topic_id JOIN popular_hashtags ON topic_hashtags.hashtag_id = popular_hashtags.hashtag_id;
SELECT topic_id, COUNT(hashtag_id) AS hashtag_count FROM topic_hashtags GROUP BY topic_id ORDER BY hashtag_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_id, topic_title FROM trending_topics ORDER BY topic_id DESC;
SELECT topic_title, topic_description FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT hashtag_text, hashtag_count FROM popular_hashtags WHERE hashtag_count > 100 ORDER BY hashtag_count DESC;
SELECT username, activity_timestamp, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_id, count(like_id) AS num_likes FROM likes GROUP BY post_id HAVING num_likes > 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_content, u.username FROM posts p INNER JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes;
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, COUNT(ph.hashtag_id) AS total_hashtags FROM users u LEFT JOIN post_hashtags ph ON u.user_id = ph.post_id GROUP BY u.username;
